alert.note: Alert for Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 28 at 3:18PM EDT until March 28 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter size hail and damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located 8 miles east of Stonemill Creek, or 20 miles south of Blountstown, and moving east at 30 mph. * Locations impacted include... Nixon Garden, Twin Pole, Central City, Kern, Wilma and Vilas.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
